creator: Chief Securities Limited
descriptionHtml:
"Chief Trader" is a one-stop online investment platform developed by Chief Securities Limited, which provides investors with a new, safe and convenient investment trading experience with new technologies and intimate user interfaces.

With "Chief Trader" on hand, you can enjoy different trading functions:

[E-Account Opening．Trade Immediately] Open securities, futures and options accounts for trading Hong Kong stocks, Shenzhen and Shanghai stock, US stocks, Singapore Stocks and Funds
[Safe and Reliable．Online Security] Two-factor authentication system ensure you safe and fast login for trading
[IPO Subscription．Quotes on Grey Market Trading] Provides a perfect quotation system including streaming quotations and charts of IPO grey market
[Rich Information．Free Real-time Quotes] Real-time quotes for listed stocks, creating your own watch list, enquiries of substantial market information, e.g. Real-time Ranking
[Easy fund trading．Screening function] Support real-time investment risk analysis for up to 10 years of performance data, good understanding of individual's investment orientation. Provide research reports on selected funds and market trends

For further enquiries, please feel free to contact our Customer Support Hotline at 2500 9199.

Notice:
- Support Android 4.4 or above
- Support Online Account Opening only on Android 5.0 or above
- Support Biometric (fingerprint) only on Android 6.0 or above
descriptionShort: Chief Trader enables you to step out for wealth creation

"Chief Trader" is a one-stop online investment platform developed by Chief Securities Limited, which provides investors with a new, safe and convenient investment trading experience with new technologies and intimate user interfaces.

With "Chief Trader" on hand, you can enjoy different trading functions:

[E-Account Opening．Trade Immediately] Open securities, futures and options accounts for trading Hong Kong stocks, Shenzhen and Shanghai stock, US stocks, Singapore Stocks and Funds
[Safe and Reliable．Online Security] Two-factor authentication system ensure you safe and fast login for trading
[IPO Subscription．Quotes on Grey Market Trading] Provides a perfect quotation system including streaming quotations and charts of IPO grey market
[Rich Information．Free Real-time Quotes] Real-time quotes for listed stocks, creating your own watch list, enquiries of substantial market information, e.g. Real-time Ranking
[Easy fund trading．Screening function] Support real-time investment risk analysis for up to 10 years of performance data, good understanding of individual's investment orientation. Provide research reports on selected funds and market trends

For further enquiries, please feel free to contact our Customer Support Hotline at 2500 9199.

Notice:
- Support Android 4.4 or above
- Support Online Account Opening only on Android 5.0 or above
- Support Biometric (fingerprint) only on Android 6.0 or above

title: Chief Trader

creator: Chief Securities Limited
descriptionHtml:
About this App
All-in-One investment platform to trade in major stock markets (Hong Kong, US, China A and Funds). We provide a hassle-free online-offline and all-rounded customer-centric digital service.

[Promotions]
 Account Opening Rewards: Earn up to HK$6,300 rewards by opening an account and referring friends
 Low Commission Fee: New US stock trading commission as low as US$0.99
 Monthly Plan Fee waiver: The $0 commission monthly payment plan is flexible and allows customers to customize monthly payments schedule and with an entry threshold as low as HK$100 for Hong Kong stock/US$10 for US stock
 Funds Subscription Rewards: $0 fund subscription fee, new customers can enjoy up to HK$6,000 rewards

[Features]
 Free Stock Quote: Enjoy free HK Stocks LV1 real -time quotes service for both new and existing customers
 Auto Monthly Investment: Simply preset eDDA Standing Instruction anytime by just a few steps on Chief Trader to the Monthly Investment Plan for Stocks/ Funds and Dividend Reinvestment Plan.
 Market Focus: Live Broadcast and Client Trend function will bring you the latest up-to-date market insights
 Performance Analysis: With Asset Trend and P&L Summary function helps you track and improves your trading performance easily.

[Well-Rounded Functions]
 E-Account Opening: Speedy Account Opening via mobile
 Secure and Reliable: Two-factor authentication Service activation and Biometric Authentication to safeguard the designated online transactions
 Chief AI: Address services enquires around the clock
 IPO Subscription: Enjoy IPO subscription service with handling fee waiver and low margin securities interest rate. We provide a professional streaming quotations and charts of IPO grey market, allowing you to receive the latest market trends with real-time tracking and push notification
 Real-time Quotes: Free real-time quotes service applicable to HK and US and stock markets, offering customized Stock Portfolio Watchlist and Live Broadcast functions,
 Valued-added Function: Flexible and user-friendly design that helps you access featured functions faster with clear trading instructions, customisable quick links and various types of deposit; with order history and check your account balance at a glance
 Flexible fund trading platform: Support10-year performance data, offer Customer Risk Profiling Questionnaire service and the latest view of Funds market trends and reports.


[Contact Us]
Website: https://www.chiefgroup.com.hk/en/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/chiefgroup
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/chiefgrouphk
CS Hotline/WhatsApp：+852 2500 9199
Email：cs@chiefgroup.com.hk
descriptionShort: Enjoy 300 Welcome Gift

descriptionHtml:
Chief Trader is an exclusive financial securities trading platform developed by Chief Securities for investors.
With 45 years of deep-rooted presence in Hong Kong, Chief Securities offers a one-stop investment service covering Hong Kong stocks, global stocks, A-shares, securities trading, U.S. stocks, Shanghai-Hong Kong Stock Connect, Hong Kong futures, global futures, stock options, warrants, callable bull/bear contracts, ETFs, asset management, bonds, and funds.

[Promotions]
• Account Opening Rewards: Get up to HK$2,100! Earn HK$300 coupon per successful referral, and HK$3,000 for 10 referrals.
• Limited Rebate: Open an account and receive up to HK$1,000 in stock transfer-in supermarket coupons.
• Low Commission Fee: Trade US stocks with commissions as low as US$0.99.
• Monthly Plan Fee Waiver: Enjoy a $0 commission monthly plan with flexible payments, starting from HK$100 for HK stocks or US$10 for US stocks.

[Ultra-Low Fees]
• No platform fees for Hong Kong and U.S. stock trading.
• U.S. stock commission as low as US$0.99, Hong Kong stock commission as low as HK$0.01.
• Free real-time Level 1 quotes for Hong Kong and U.S. stocks.
• Zero-commission monthly investment plans for Hong Kong and U.S. stock funds.

[Key Features]
Innovative Trading Features
• Free Real-Time Quotes: Both new and existing users enjoy free Level 1 streaming quotes for Hong Kong, U.S., and A-shares, ensuring you never miss a market opportunity.
• Automated Monthly Investment: Easily set up eDDA direct deposits to automate stock/fund investments and reinvest dividends through Chief Trader, helping you build wealth effortlessly.
• Market Insights: Stay ahead with live market trends and customer activity tracking, providing real-time updates on trending stocks.
• Trading Analytics: Instantly track your trading performance with personal asset trend charts and P&L overviews.

[Essential Functions]
• Fast & Easy to open an account via mobile in minutes and start trading immediately.
• Support : 24/7 online customer support to answer your queries anytime.
• Secure & Reliable: Supports two-factor authentication (2FA) and biometric verification for secure and seamless transactions.
• IPO Subscription: Enjoy $0 handling fees on cash applications and low-interest margin financing, along with live gray market streaming quotes and charts for real-time IPO updates.
• Comprehensive Quote System: Get free Hong Kong and U.S. stock streaming quotes, create custom watchlists, and track market movements with real-time alerts.
• Advanced Trading Functions: Offers a full range of order types, fast trading features, multiple online deposit methods, and a clear account balance overview.
• Fund Trading: Access 10 years of historical performance data, investment risk analysis, curated fund selections, and market research reports.

* Promotions T&C Apply.

Download now and experience an all-in-one investment and trading app!

[Contact Us]

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/chiefanshk/

[Important Disclosure]
Chief Securities Limited, Chief Commodities Limited and Chief Financial Capital Limited are subsidiaries of Chief Group Limited and operate under Hong Kong regulatory regime. These companies are licensed by the Hong Kong Securities and Futures Commission (SFC) with Central Entity Numbers ADI983, AAZ607 and BAQ537 respectively to carry out Regulated Activity Type 1 (Dealing in securities), Type 2 (Dealing in futures contracts), Type 4 (Advising on securities), Type 5 (Advising on futures contracts), Type 6 (Advising on corporate finance), Type 7 (Providing automated trading services) and Type 9 (Asset management). Chief aims to build a seamless global trading network, enabling investors to trade global securities at ultra-low costs through an account.
